About ZeroJS

What is ZeroJS?

ZeroJS is a Python framework for building modern web frontends without writing JavaScript.

Create interactive web applications using Python on both server and client, with file-based routing, HTMX integration, and native PyScript support.

Key Benefits

  • No JavaScript required for interactivity
  • Full Python ecosystem on server and client
  • Simple file-based routing
  • Built on FastAPI's performance
